description:
Turn your hammock into your own personal cocoon of coziness and extend hammock season. Weather-resistant and filled with water-repellant down, this quilt isn’t bothered by heavy dew or morning frost. The quilted toe box keeps your feet warm, just like you're in your bed at home.

  • Lightweight ripstop nylon shell with a water-repellent finish
  • Nylon taffeta lining
  • 750 fill-power DownTek™ uses Bluesign™ approved chemistry for water-repellency, and is antimicrobial and antibacterial
  • Horizontal and vertical baffles maximize warmth and accommodate the large opening
  • Baffles prevent insulation from shifting and creating cold spots
  • Tapered design, much like a mummy bag, with adjustable draft collar
  • Recommended temperature range -1–4ºC
  • Pairs with the Blaze UnderQuilt (sold separately)
name: ENO Ignitor TopQuilt
